# uptimekuma_notification_sendgrid (Resource)

SendGrid notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_sendgrid" "example" {
  name       = "SendGrid Notifications"
  api_key    = "SG.your-api-key-here"
  to_email   = "alerts@example.com"
  from_email = "monitoring@example.com"
  subject    = "Uptime Alert Notification"
  is_active  = true
  is_default = false
}

resource "uptimekuma_notification_sendgrid" "with_cc_bcc" {
  name       = "SendGrid with CC/BCC"
  api_key    = "SG.your-api-key-here"
  to_email   = "alerts@example.com"
  from_email = "monitoring@example.com"
  subject    = "Critical Alert"
  cc_email   = "team-lead@example.com"
  bcc_email  = "archive@example.com"
  is_active  = true
  is_default = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) SendGrid API key
- `from_email` (String) Sender email address
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `subject` (String) Email subject
- `to_email` (String) Recipient email address

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `bcc_email` (String) BCC email addresses
- `cc_email` (String) CC email addresses
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
